original_text: And ye shall make no league with the inhabitants of this land; ye shall throw down their altars: but ye have not obeyed my voice: why have ye done this?
korean_text: 너희는 이 땅의 주민과 언약을 맺지 말며 그들의 제단들을 헐라 하였거늘 너희가 내 목소리를 듣지 아니하였으니 어찌하여 그리하였느냐

sentences.original_text: And ye shall make no league
with the inhabitants of this land
ye shall throw down their altars
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그들의 제단을 헐어 버려야 한다

sentences.original_text: but ye have not obeyed my voice
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 내 음성에 순종하지 않았다
